Text: Saw your PlanBMovie videos at youtube. Doesn't look like you've been fasting 3 weeks. No liquids for 5 days and you wouldn't be making vids.
I'm limiting myself to root beer and chips until They stop with the chamtrails.
Please go ahead and starve yourself to death as soon as possble and quit spamming us with your stupid environmental wacko bullshit!

Thanks for the uploads. However, it is pointless to educate the masses. Most humans are not truly sentient beings and are unable to take in information, draw logical conclusions and act in their own best interests. 

Earth is infested with a parasite called Homo sapiens sapiens that will destroy the planet's ability to support life unless someone or something intervenes. 

Just make a difference in your own life and enjoy what time you have left. We are all here to evolve ourselves, not fix humanity.
No posts in 15 days. I take it your death fast turned out OK.

" Earth is infested with a parasite called Homo sapiens that will destroy the planet's ability to support life unless someone or something intervenes. "

Deep ecology, how shallow. I hope you live in a hollow tree and eat grass and leaves.
